node.text: {{emote|*Jerenah turns in circles before lying down.*}}~ {{emote|*Jerenah chases =pronouns.possessive= tail.*}}~ {{emote|*Jerenah laps some drool right back up.*}}~ {{emote|*Jerenah gets up on =pronouns.possessive= hind legs.*}}

Kids these days have it easy: when I was young, glotrot used to spoil your whole water supply.~ Back in my days, people knew the difference between daggers and short swords.~ Young'uns today complicate everything... The Moon what now? They're called the Deathlands, darn it!~ Ambidextry everywhere... Way back when, this used to really mean something.~ Humph. Who are you again?~ {{emote|*Alther concentrates intensely for a few seconds.*}}
I'm in love with a cat.
I'm in love with a dog.

{{emote|*soft growling*}}~ {{emote|*tired panting*}}~ Yes? {{emote|*interrogative bark*}}~ Better not steal them starapples, traveler.~ {{emote|*starapple in jaws*}} Hon't neeh hanhs to hick sharahhles.~ Anything I can help ye with? {{emote|*tilting head*}}~ Take me word for it =player.formalAddressTerm=: always spit out seeds.

{{emote|*purring*}}~ {{emote|*soft meowing*}}~ What now? {{emote|*ears twitching*}}~~ I en't done with the milking for the day, =player.formalAddressTerm=.~ Moon and sun, cheese and wafers, =player.formalAddressTerm=.~ If you en't helping, don't stand in me way.~ Hmm? {{emote|*licking a paw*}}~ Get yourself some meat to cook crispy, =player.formalAddressTerm=. You'll thank me later.
